details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.5 Tables - Headers, IDs and Scope
details.description: If the table's structure is not determinable via Headers and IDs, then structure elements of type TH shall have a Scope attribute

rule.description: If the table's structure is not determinable via Headers and IDs, then structure elements of type TH shall have a Scope attribute

error.message: In a table not organized with Headers attributes and IDs, a TH cell does not contain a Scope attribute
